event.title: Information communication network
event.description:
Linens Optic Patch cords are generally ultra reliable components presenting low insertion loss along with return loss. Our Fibers Optic Patch cords include things like LC Patch Cord, SC Area Cord, FC Patch String, ST Patch Cord, MPO Patch Cord, MTP Patch Twine, etc. They come with the selection of simplex or duplex cable configuration. Extensive range of fibers patch cables are terminated with state-of-the-art connectors and accessible in any combination of ST, SC, LC and MTRJ with PC, UPC or APC polish types based on your standard or custom configurations. Fiber Optic Patch cords may be applied in Long Distance Optical Communication System, Telecommunication System, CATV Network, Active gadget termination, etc.

A fiber-optic patch cord can be a fiber-optic cable capped on either end with connectors that allow it to become rapidly and conveniently powering CATV, an optical swap or other telecommunication gear. Its thick layer of protection is used to connect the optical transmitter, phone, and the terminal container. This is known since “interconnect-style cabling”
Quick Particulars:
Place of Origin: Jiangsu, Offshore (Mainland)

Brand Name: RAIWAV

Model Number: RW-LC-LC MMD Replacement patch Cable

Mode: Multi-Mode

Connector Type: LC-LC

Ferrule end confront: PC/UPC/APC

Fiber counts: Simplex/Duplex

Coat: PVC/LSZH

Cable length: 1/2/3/5/10/20m or perhaps customized

Quality Standard: Telcordia’s GR-326-Core as well as IEC

Flammability Grade: OFN/OFNR/OFNP

Certification: ISO9001/14001/OHSAS18001/TLC

Company Type: Factory

MTP trunk cable, a cost-effective option to time-consuming field termination, is for high-density fiber patching throughout data centers which need space saving and decrease cable management troubles.
0. 35dB IL, MTP (MPO) that will MTP connector and 3 OR MORE. 0mm Plenum (OFNP) bunch cable is created for 40G/100G direct association and high-density data center applications.


Applications

1. Information communication network
2. Optical process access network
3. Storage space network fiber channel
SEVERAL. High density architectures.
